author: Aria Bendix
title: A 21-year-old Canadian woman stayed in Wuhan because she didn't want to abandon her cat. The lockdown just lifted, but she's still 'fenced in.'
description: Kristina Shramko, a 21-year-old Canadian citizen, lived under lockdown in Wuhan, China, for 76 days. Shramko decided not to board an evacuation flight to Canada in February because she wasn't allowed to take her cat. Wuhan's lockdown lifted this week, but Shr…
content:
More than 75 days have passed since Kristina Shramko was told to stay inside her apartment in Wuhan, China.
Shramko, a 21-year-old Canadian citizen, moved to Wuhan about eight months before the city became the origin site of the coronavirus pandemic. On Janu… [+6555 chars]
